    Interface and Description
    xyz.morphia.mapping.CustomMapper 
    xyz.morphia.mapping.lazy.DatastoreProvider
    DatastoreProviders are no longer necessary

    Class and Description
    xyz.morphia.DAO
    use xyz.morphia.dao.BasicDAO

    This is an internal implementation of a published API. No public alternative planned.

    xyz.morphia.mapping.MappedField

    This feature will not be supported in 2.0

    this is being replaced by MongoCursor

    this is being replaced by MongoCursor

    Use Sort instead.

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOpsImpl.add(String, Object)
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOperations.add(String, Object)
    use UpdateOperations.addToSet(String, Object) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOpsImpl.add(String, Object, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOperations.add(String, Object, boolean)
    use UpdateOperations.push(String, Object) if addDups is false or UpdateOperations.addToSet(String, Object) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOpsImpl.addAll(String, List<?>, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOperations.addAll(String, List<?>, boolean)
    use UpdateOperations.push(String, List) if addDups is false or UpdateOperations.addToSet(String, List)

    Use Sort.ascending(String) instead.

  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl(Morphia, Mapper, MongoClient, String)
    This is not meant to be directly instantiated by end user code. Use Morphia.createDatastore(MongoClient, Mapper, String)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl(Morphia, MongoClient, String)
    This is not meant to be directly instantiated by end user code. Use Morphia.createDatastore(MongoClient, Mapper, String)
    xyz.morphia.mapping.MapperOptions()
    use the Builder instead
    xyz.morphia.mapping.MapperOptions(MapperOptions)
    use the Builder instead
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    xyz.morphia.query.FilterOperator.WITHIN
    New in server version 2.4: $geoWithin replaces $within which is deprecated.
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.background
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.background
    use the IndexOptions found in Indexed.options()

    unimplemented

    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.dropDups
    this functionality is no longer supported on the server

    Support for this has been removed from the server. This value is ignored.
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.dropDups
    Support for this has been removed from the server. This value is ignored.

    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
